      Turns the 2D item array into a 1D item array, for use in the inventory sorting.

      Returns whether or not the inventory has a specific item.
      intDuo Inventory.searchForItem(Item item)
      Returns the row and column as an intDuo of the specified item if the item is not there, it will return -1, -1
